Research.Description: Research project under Dr. Sonika Dahiya which aims to substantially reduce the effect of outliers on real-world datasets. Currently testing the effects of merging Intutionistic Fuzzy Set theory and Density Oriented Outlier Detection along with the results achieved with other high performance algorithms such as Noice Clustering and Credibilistic Fuzzy C Means.

Projects: Image Segmentation using Density Oriented Fuzzy-C-means clustering Algorithm
Dynamic hand Gesture recognition using and neural networks
Rate Limiter Libraries Published to npmjs
